title: Interview with Person of Interest EP Jonathan Nolan, Michael Emerson and Jim Caviezel
author: The Winchester Family Business/TVFTROU
comment: JC is so me in  every group discussion xD
description: This is our roundtable interview with EP Jonathan Nolan and lead actors Michael Emerson and Jim Caviezel in the Person of Interest press room at San Diego Comic Con.  It took place of July 11th.  They talk about the shortened season five (no huge spoilers) which they hope is not the last.
